QuestData.Title: The Frozen Earth
QuestData.Description: We captured these elementals from nearby, and I have plenty of defenders now. But, it takes a great deal of power to make them strong enough to stand up to our enemies.$B$BThe frozen earth at Drak'Mabwa to the northwest have what I need to maintain our defenses. I'll need more of their essence if I'm to keep this up.
QuestData.LogDescription: Element-Tamer Dagoda at Zim'Torga wants you to collect 7 Essence of the Frozen Earth.
QuestData.CompletionText: I hope that you've returned with enough. The attacks from the Pools of Jin'Alai have become more desperate after what you did to them.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $c. Those essences should be enough to fuel my casting for quite some time.
